languages.text: "Когда еретики обрушились на обитель, мы дали им бой. Но нечестивцы погасили искры чистоты воинов Омниссии, погребя их под валом своих тел. Тогда я повелел немногим своим уцелевшим братьям отступить в потаенные чертоги монастыря. Скрывшись там, мы начали уничтожать захвативших монастырь богохульников исподтишка. Увы, как бы ни был свиреп гнев моих братьев, я не вправе был дозволить им умереть в честной схватке — ведь нам еще предстоит отвоевать нашу обитель".

"When the heretics descended in droves upon this cenobium, we gave battle. But the unholy foes buried the Omnissiah's warriors under a mass of their bodies, thus extinguishing the defenders' sparks of purity. It was then that I ordered my few surviving brethren to retreat into the monastery's secret chambers. Upon taking refuge there, we began to destroy the blasphemous intruders in surreptitious ways. Alas, as fiery as my brethren's anger was, I had no right to permit them to die in honest combat, for the task of taking back our abode still lay ahead for us."
languages.original_text: "Когда еретики обрушились на обитель, мы дали им бой. Но нечестивцы погасили искры чистоты воинов Омниссии, погребя их под валом своих тел. Тогда я повелел немногим своим уцелевшим братьям отступить в потаенные чертоги монастыря. Скрывшись там, мы начали уничтожать захвативших монастырь богохульников исподтишка. Увы, как бы ни был свиреп гнев моих братьев, я не вправе был дозволить им умереть в честной схватке — ведь нам еще предстоит отвоевать нашу обитель".

traits.locale_text: "When the heretics descended in droves upon this cenobium, we gave battle. But the unholy foes buried the Omnissiah's warriors under a mass of their bodies, thus extinguishing the defenders' sparks of purity. It was then that I ordered my few surviving brethren to retreat into the monastery's secret chambers. Upon taking our refuge there, we began to destroy the blasphemous intruders in surreptitious ways. Alas, as fiery as my brethren's anger was, I had no right to permit them to die in honest combat, for the task of taking back our abode would fall to us and none else."

"When the heretics descended in droves upon this cenobium, we gave battle. It was then that I ordered my few surviving brethren to retreat into the monastery's secret chambers. Alas, as fiery as my brethren's anger was, I had no right to permit them to die in honest combat, for the task of taking back our abode would fall to us and none else."

But the unholy foes buried the Omnissiah's warriors under a mass of their bodies, thus extinguishing the defenders' sparks of purity. It was then that I ordered my few surviving brethren to retreat into the monastery's secret chambers. Upon taking refuge there, we began to destroy the blasphemous intruders in surreptitious ways. Alas, as fiery as my brethren's anger was, I had no right to permit them to die in honest combat, for the task of taking back our abode still lay ahead for us."

languages.text: "Als die Ketzer in Scharen über dieses Cenobium hergefallen sind, haben wir gekämpft. Doch die unheiligen Feinde haben die Krieger des Omnissiah unter einer Masse ihrer Körper begraben und damit die Reinheitsfunken der Verteidiger gelöscht. Da habe ich meinen überlebenden Brüdern befohlen, sich in die Geheimkammern des Klosters zurückzuziehen. Nachdem wir dort Zuflucht gesucht hatten, begann wir damit, die blasphemischen Eindringlinge auf unauffällige Weise zu vernichten. Doch so feurig der Zorn meiner Brüder auch war, ich hatte nicht das Recht, ihnen zu gestatten, im ehrlichen Kampf zu sterben. Denn die Aufgabe, unser Kloster zurückzuerobern, lag noch immer vor uns."
languages.original_text: "When the heretics descended in droves upon this cenobium, we gave battle. But the unholy foes buried the Omnissiah's warriors under a mass of their bodies, thus extinguishing the defenders' sparks of purity. It was then that I ordered my few surviving brethren to retreat into the monastery's secret chambers. Upon taking refuge there, we began to destroy the blasphemous intruders in surreptitious ways. Alas, as fiery as my brethren's anger was, I had no right to permit them to die in honest combat, for the task of taking back our abode still lay ahead for us."

traits.locale_text: "Als die Ketzer in Scharen über dieses Cenobium hergefallen sind, haben wir gekämpft. Doch die unheiligen Feinde haben die Krieger des Omnissiah unter einer Masse ihrer Körper begraben und damit die Reinheitsfunken der Verteidiger gelöscht. Da habe ich meinen überlebenden Brüdern befohlen, sich in die Geheimkammern des Klosters zurückzuziehen. Nachdem wir dort Zuflucht gesucht hatten, begann wir damit, die blasphemischen Eindringlinge auf unauffällige Weise zu vernichten. Doch so feurig der Zorn meiner Brüder auch war, ich hatte nicht das Recht, ihnen zu gestatten, im ehrlichen Kampf zu sterben. Denn die Aufgabe, unser Kloster zurückzuerobern, war unsere und unsere allein."

languages.text: « Quand les hérétiques ont fondu en masse sur ce Cenobium, nous avons livré bataille, mais ces ennemis impies ont submergé les guerriers de l'Omnimessie sous leur multitude, éteignant les étincelles de pureté des défenseurs. C'est alors que j'ai ordonné à mes quelques frères survivants de battre en retraite dans les salles secrètes du monastère. Une fois en sécurité, nous avons commencé à éliminer les blasphémateurs de façon plus... clandestine. Hélas, malgré l'ardeur et la colère de mes frères, je n'ai pu leur permettre de mourir avec honneur au combat, car il nous restait encore à reconquérir notre temple. »
languages.original_text: "When the heretics descended in droves upon this cenobium, we gave battle. But the unholy foes buried the Omnissiah's warriors under a mass of their bodies, thus extinguishing the defenders' sparks of purity. It was then that I ordered my few surviving brethren to retreat into the monastery's secret chambers. Upon taking refuge there, we began to destroy the blasphemous intruders in surreptitious ways. Alas, as fiery as my brethren's anger was, I had no right to permit them to die in honest combat, for the task of taking back our abode still lay ahead for us."

traits.locale_text: « Quand les hérétiques sont arrivés en masse sur ce Cenobium, nous avons livré bataille, mais ces ennemis impies ont submergé les guerriers de l'Omnimessie sous leur multitude, éteignant les étincelles de pureté des défenseurs. C'est alors que j'ai ordonné à mes quelques frères survivants de battre en retraite dans les salles secrètes du monastère. Une fois en sécurité, nous avons commencé à éliminer les blasphémateurs de façon plus... clandestine. Hélas, malgré l'ardeur et la colère de mes frères, je n'ai pu leur permettre de mourir avec honneur au combat, car la reconquête de notre temple nous revenait à nous, et à personne d'autre. »

languages.text: “当时，那些异端分子成群结队闯入修道院，我们进行了抵抗。但邪恶的敌人数量太多，他们靠数量优势淹没了欧姆尼塞亚的战士，熄灭了反抗者的纯洁火花。于是，我命令为数不多的幸存者撤退到修道院的密室里，在那里进行避难。在那之后，我们开始悄悄行动，杀死那些污秽的入侵者。遗憾的是，尽管我的兄弟们怒火中烧，但我无权让他们与敌人正面冲突，白白牺牲，毕竟我们还要夺回我们的神殿。”
languages.original_text: "When the heretics descended in droves upon this cenobium, we gave battle. But the unholy foes buried the Omnissiah's warriors under a mass of their bodies, thus extinguishing the defenders' sparks of purity. It was then that I ordered my few surviving brethren to retreat into the monastery's secret chambers. Upon taking refuge there, we began to destroy the blasphemous intruders in surreptitious ways. Alas, as fiery as my brethren's anger was, I had no right to permit them to die in honest combat, for the task of taking back our abode still lay ahead for us."

traits.locale_text: “当时，异教徒成群结队闯入修道院，我们进行了抵抗。但邪恶的敌人数量太多，他们靠数量优势淹没了欧姆尼塞亚的战士，熄灭了反抗者的纯洁火花。于是，我命令为数不多的幸存者撤退到修道院的密室里，在那里进行避难。在那之后，我们开始悄悄行动，杀死那些污秽的入侵者。遗憾的是，尽管我的兄弟们怒火中烧，但我无权让他们与敌人正面冲突，白白牺牲。夺回家园的任务必须由我们自己完成，不能交给外人来做。”

languages.text: 「異端者たちが大挙してこのセノビウムに押し寄せたとき、我々は戦いを挑んだ。しかし、不浄な敵は万機神の戦士たちを数多の死体の下に葬り去り、守護者たちの純潔の火種を消し去った。その時、私は生き残った数少ない兄弟たちに修道院の秘密の部屋に退却するよう命じた。そこに避難すると、私たちは密かに冒涜的な侵入者を破壊し始めた。兄弟たちの怒りは相当なものだったが、私には彼らをこの本物の戦いにおいて死なせる権利はなかった。なぜならば、我々の住処を取り戻す任務は、まだ道の途中だったからだ」
languages.original_text: "When the heretics descended in droves upon this cenobium, we gave battle. But the unholy foes buried the Omnissiah's warriors under a mass of their bodies, thus extinguishing the defenders' sparks of purity. It was then that I ordered my few surviving brethren to retreat into the monastery's secret chambers. Upon taking refuge there, we began to destroy the blasphemous intruders in surreptitious ways. Alas, as fiery as my brethren's anger was, I had no right to permit them to die in honest combat, for the task of taking back our abode still lay ahead for us."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者たちが大挙してこのセノビウムに押し寄せたとき、我々は戦いを挑んだ。しかし、不浄な敵は万機神の戦士たちを数多の死体の下に葬り去り、守護者たちの純潔の火種を消し去った。その時、私は生き残った数少ない兄弟たちに修道院の秘密の部屋に退却するよう命じた。そこに避難すると、私たちは密かに冒涜的な侵入者を破壊し始めた。兄弟たちの怒りは相当なものだったが、私には彼らをこの本物の戦いにおいて死なせる権利はなかった。我々の住処を取り戻す任務は、我々次第だったのだから」

languages.text: «Cuando los herejes descendieron en tropel sobre este Cenobio, libramos una batalla. Pero los impíos enemigos sepultaron a los guerreros del Omnissiah bajo una masa de cuerpos, extinguiendo así las chispas de pureza de los defensores. Fue entonces cuando ordené a mis hermanos supervivientes que se retiraran a las cámaras secretas del monasterio. Al refugiarnos allí, empezamos a acabar sigilosamente con los intrusos blasfemos. Por muy ardiente que fuera la ira de mis hermanos, no tenía derecho a permitir que murieran en un combate honesto, pues la tarea de recuperar nuestra morada seguía pendiente».
languages.original_text: "When the heretics descended in droves upon this cenobium, we gave battle. But the unholy foes buried the Omnissiah's warriors under a mass of their bodies, thus extinguishing the defenders' sparks of purity. It was then that I ordered my few surviving brethren to retreat into the monastery's secret chambers. Upon taking refuge there, we began to destroy the blasphemous intruders in surreptitious ways. Alas, as fiery as my brethren's anger was, I had no right to permit them to die in honest combat, for the task of taking back our abode still lay ahead for us."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando los herejes descendieron en tropel sobre este cenobio, libramos una batalla. Pero los impíos enemigos sepultaron a los guerreros del Omnissiah bajo una masa de cuerpos, extinguiendo así las chispas de pureza de los defensores. Fue entonces cuando ordené a mis hermanos supervivientes que se retiraran a las cámaras secretas del monasterio. Al refugiarnos allí, empezamos a acabar sigilosamente con los intrusos blasfemos. Por muy ardiente que fuera la ira de mis hermanos, no tenía derecho a permitir que murieran en un combate honesto, pues la tarea de recuperar nuestra morada recaería sobre nosotros y nadie más».

languages.text: "Kâfirler sürü hâlinde senobiyuma üşüştüğünde savaştık. Ancak uğursuz düşmanlarımız, Hermesih'in savaşçılarını beden yığınlarının altına gömdü. Bu yüzden de savunucuların saflık kıvılcımları söndü. Tam o anda, sağ kalan birkaç kardeşime manastırın gizli odalarına çekilme emri verdim. Oralara sığındıktan sonra dinsiz istilacıları kaçamak yollarla yok etmeye başladık. Kardeşlerim öfkeyle dolup taşıyor olsalar da aleni bir çatışmada ölmelerine göz yummaya hakkım yoktu. Zira mübarek evimizi geri almak görevimizdi."
languages.original_text: "When the heretics descended in droves upon this cenobium, we gave battle. But the unholy foes buried the Omnissiah's warriors under a mass of their bodies, thus extinguishing the defenders' sparks of purity. It was then that I ordered my few surviving brethren to retreat into the monastery's secret chambers. Upon taking refuge there, we began to destroy the blasphemous intruders in surreptitious ways. Alas, as fiery as my brethren's anger was, I had no right to permit them to die in honest combat, for the task of taking back our abode still lay ahead for us."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirler sürü hâlinde senobiyuma indiğinde savaştık. Ancak kötücül düşmanlarımız, Hermesih'in savaşçılarını beden yığınlarının altına gömdü, bu sayede de savunucuların saflık kıvılcımlarını söndürdüler. O hâldeyken hayatta kalan birkaç kardeşime manastırın gizli odalarına geri çekilme emri verdim. Odalara sığındıktan sonra dinsiz istilacıları kaçamak yollarla yok etmeye başladık. Kardeşlerim ne kadar yoğun bir öfke hissediyor olsa da düzgün bir çatışmada ölmelerine müsaade etmeye hakkım yoktu. İkametgâhımızı geri almak görevimizdi."
